divs: Sighting DetailsMy soninlaw was driving us home from my daughter who lives in Auburn, ga. We we going on 85, I looked out of the window, and looked to my right, and up. I saw a triangle, with red flashing lights on top and bottom. We were moving avout 60 ,and it was so close I could almost reach out. No one else saw it. I kept quiet until today. I am not sure if anyone else saw it. it was about 9:45. I didn't really feel anything.
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around October 1st 2010
Summary: coming home from auburn ga.to my right of the car I looked out saw a triangle with red flashing lights on top and bottom.
